body_html: What is the meaning of theoretically supported? IE, would it make sense to add int32 to the list of theoretically supported types for Conv2D because there may eventually be an integer implementation?
body_text: What is the meaning of theoretically supported? IE, would it make sense to add int32 to the list of theoretically supported types for Conv2D because there may eventually be an integer implementation?
body: What is the meaning of theoretically supported? IE, would it make sense to add `int32` to the list of theoretically supported types for `Conv2D` because there may eventually be an integer implementation?
